definition: fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: Foreign reporters weren't permitted inside a fence around the courthouse in western Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 外国记者被拦在位于沪西的法院栅栏外。

sentences.english: The dog leapt over the gate into the field.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗跃过栅栏门奔向田野。

sentences.english: The freest song comes not through bars and wires.
sentences.chinese: 最自由的歌儿可不会从栅栏中传出。

sentences.english: Exterior has heavy duty iron gate and fence through out .
sentences.chinese: 外有重型的铁闸，并通过了栅栏。

sentences.english: We boxed the house and garden in with fences.
sentences.chinese: 我们用栅栏把房子和花园围了起来。

sentences.english: The boy bowled over the fence and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩撞倒了栅栏和花朵。

sentences.english: Our evident fence near the residence is our confidence of correspondent defence.
sentences.chinese: 我们住宅周围彰彰的栅栏是我们相应防卫的信念。

sentences.english: He could see the young man turn in there by the gate and walk along the fence.
sentences.chinese: 他能看到这个年轻人进了大门，沿着栅栏走着。

sentences.english: Fiona pointed her watch at the bars and in a blink of an eye, it disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 霏欧纳把表对准了栅栏，眨眼之间它就不见了。

sentences.english: The playground has been railed in.
Instead, use a post and rail fence or woven wire horse fencing.
sentences.chinese: 相反，使用邮政和铁路栅栏或编织线马剑击等。

sentences.english: The camp was guarded by armed soldiers and ringed with high fences and rolls of razor wire.
sentences.chinese: 武装守卫的营地由高高的栅栏隔离并绕满了镭射线。

sentences.english: Hurdle technology is the essential events of food preservation.
sentences.chinese: 栅栏技术是食品保藏的根本所在。

sentences.english: He tapered the end of the fence post with an axe.
sentences.chinese: 他用斧子把栅栏的一头削尖。

sentences.english: This fence should be propped up.
sentences.chinese: 这栅栏该用东西支一支。

sentences.english: Also a threat to the fence near the green, adverse impacts.
sentences.chinese: 同时还威胁到栅栏附近的绿化，殃及池鱼。

definition: Muzha (old spelling: Mucha), suburb to the southeast of Taipei
to surround/to encircle/to enclose/to fence in
fence (esp. of bamboo or wood railings)
cheval de frise (a type of barrier)
